Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Packages

  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Packages 
    Package and Description
    com.hazelcast.mapreduce
    MapReduce is deprecated and will be removed in 4.0. For map aggregations, you can use Aggregator on IMap. For general data processing, it is superseded by Hazelcast Jet.
    com.hazelcast.mapreduce.aggregation
    Use fast-aggregations com.hazelcast.aggregation
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.hazelcast.mapreduce.aggregation.Aggregation
    Use new fast-aggregations IMap.aggregate(Aggregator) or IMap.aggregate(Aggregator, Predicate).
    com.hazelcast.core.AsyncAtomicLong
    com.hazelcast.core.AsyncAtomicReference
    com.hazelcast.mapreduce.Collator
    MapReduce is deprecated and will be removed in 4.0. For map aggregations, you can use Aggregator on IMap. For general data processing, it is superseded by Hazelcast Jet.

    com.hazelcast.spi.SharedService
    since 3.7. A service can be retrieved using NodeEngine.getService(String)
    com.hazelcast.mapreduce.TrackableJob
    MapReduce is deprecated and will be removed in 4.0. For map aggregations, you can use Aggregator on IMap. For general data processing, it is superseded by Hazelcast Jet.

    this class will be removed in 4.0; it is meant for internal usage only.
    com.hazelcast.nio.UnsafeHelper
    Use MemoryAccessor instead due to following reasons:

    Deprecated to MemoryAccessor due to following reasons:

    • Preventing hard-dependency to Unsafe/
    • Some platforms (such as SPARC) don't support unaligned memory access. So on these platforms memory access alignments must be checked and handled if possible.

    com.hazelcast.config.WanReplicationRefReadOnly
    this class will be removed in 4.0; it is meant for internal usage only.

    Enum and Description
    com.hazelcast.internal.eviction.EvictionPolicyType
    since 3.9, use EvictionPolicy instead

    MapReduce is deprecated and will be removed in 4.0. For map aggregations, you can use Aggregator on IMap. For general data processing, it is superseded by Hazelcast Jet.

    Field and Description

    since 3.8, please use EvictionConfig.DEFAULT_EVICTION_POLICY

    since 3.8, please use EvictionConfig.DEFAULT_MAX_ENTRY_COUNT_FOR_ON_HEAP_MAP

    com.hazelcast.spi.properties.GroupProperty.VERSION_CHECK_ENABLED
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.hazelcast.client.config.ClientConfig.addAddress(String...)
    com.hazelcast.core.IMap.addEntryListener(EntryListener, boolean)
    please use IMap.addEntryListener(MapListener, boolean) instead
    com.hazelcast.core.IMap.addEntryListener(EntryListener, K, boolean)
    please use IMap.addEntryListener(MapListener, Object, boolean) instead
    com.hazelcast.core.IMap.addEntryListener(EntryListener, Predicate<K, V>, boolean)
    please use IMap.addEntryListener(MapListener, com.hazelcast.query.Predicate, boolean) instead
    com.hazelcast.core.IMap.addEntryListener(EntryListener, Predicate<K, V>, K, boolean)
    please use IMap.addEntryListener(MapListener, com.hazelcast.query.Predicate, Object, boolean) instead
    com.hazelcast.core.IMap.addLocalEntryListener(EntryListener)
    please use IMap.addLocalEntryListener(MapListener) instead
    com.hazelcast.core.IMap.addLocalEntryListener(EntryListener, Predicate<K, V>, boolean)
    please use IMap.addLocalEntryListener(MapListener, com.hazelcast.query.Predicate, boolean) instead
    com.hazelcast.core.IMap.addLocalEntryListener(EntryListener, Predicate<K, V>, K, boolean)
    please use IMap.addLocalEntryListener(MapListener, com.hazelcast.query.Predicate, Object, boolean) instead
    com.hazelcast.client.config.ClientConfig.addNearCacheConfig(String, NearCacheConfig)
    com.hazelcast.core.IMap.aggregate(Supplier<K, V, SuppliedValue>, Aggregation<K, SuppliedValue, Result>)
    please use fast-aggregations IMap.aggregate(Aggregator) or IMap.aggregate(Aggregator, Predicate) instead
    com.hazelcast.core.MultiMap.aggregate(Supplier<K, V, SuppliedValue>, Aggregation<K, SuppliedValue, Result>)
    The old Aggregations API is superseded by Fast Aggregations (com.hazelcast.aggregation) which does not yet support MultiMap. Hazelcast Jet can be used in the future to replace this functionality.
    com.hazelcast.core.IMap.aggregate(Supplier<K, V, SuppliedValue>, Aggregation<K, SuppliedValue, Result>, JobTracker)
    please use fast-aggregations IMap.aggregate(Aggregator) or IMap.aggregate(Aggregator, Predicate) instead
    com.hazelcast.core.MultiMap.aggregate(Supplier<K, V, SuppliedValue>, Aggregation<K, SuppliedValue, Result>, JobTracker)
    The old Aggregations API is superseded by Fast Aggregations (com.hazelcast.aggregation) which does not yet support MultiMap. Hazelcast Jet can be used in the future to replace this functionality.
    com.hazelcast.config.MemberAttributeConfig.asReadOnly()
    this method will be removed in 4.0; it is meant for internal usage only
    com.hazelcast.core.AsyncAtomicReference.asyncSetAndGet(E)
    will be removed from Hazelcast 3.4 since it doesn't really serve a purpose.

    com.hazelcast.config.ReplicatedMapConfig.getConcurrencyLevel()
    new implementation doesn't use mutexes
    com.hazelcast.client.config.ClientConfig.getConnectionAttemptLimit()
    com.hazelcast.client.config.ClientConfig.getConnectionAttemptPeriod()
    com.hazelcast.client.config.ClientConfig.getConnectionTimeout()
    com.hazelcast.config.MapConfig.getEvictionPercentage()
    As of version 3.7, eviction mechanism changed. It uses a probabilistic algorithm based on sampling. Please see documentation for further details.
    com.hazelcast.config.NearCacheConfig.getEvictionPolicy()
    since 3.8, please use NearCacheConfig.getEvictionConfig() and EvictionConfig.getEvictionPolicy()
    com.hazelcast.internal.eviction.EvictionConfiguration.getEvictionPolicyType()
    since 3.9, use EvictionConfiguration.getEvictionPolicy() instead
    com.hazelcast.config.EvictionConfig.getEvictionPolicyType()
    since 3.9, please use EvictionConfig.getEvictionPolicy()
    com.hazelcast.client.spi.ClientProxy.getId()
    com.hazelcast.config.LoginModuleConfig.getImplementation()
    com.hazelcast.core.Member.getInetSocketAddress()
    use Member.getSocketAddress() instead
    com.hazelcast.core.HazelcastInstance.getJobTracker(String)
    MapReduce is deprecated and will be removed in 4.0. For map aggregations, you can use Aggregator on IMap. For general data processing, it is superseded by Hazelcast Jet.
    com.hazelcast.core.ILock.getKey()
    use DistributedObject.getName() instead.
    com.hazelcast.concurrent.lock.LockProxy.getKey()
    com.hazelcast.client.proxy.ClientLockProxy.getKey()
    com.hazelcast.config.NearCacheConfig.getMaxSize()
    since 3.8, please use NearCacheConfig.getEvictionConfig() and EvictionConfig.getSize()
    com.hazelcast.config.CacheEvictionConfig.getMaxSizePolicy()
    Use EvictionConfig.getMaximumSizePolicy() instead of this
    com.hazelcast.config.MapConfig.getMinEvictionCheckMillis()
    As of version 3.7, eviction mechanism changed. It uses a probabilistic algorithm based on sampling. Please see documentation for further details.
    com.hazelcast.core.DistributedObjectEvent.getObjectId()
    since 3.5. Please use DistributedObjectEvent.getObjectName() instead.
    com.hazelcast.spi.impl.operationexecutor.OperationExecutor.getPriorityQueueSize()
    com.hazelcast.spi.impl.operationexecutor.OperationExecutor.getQueueSize()
    com.hazelcast.config.ReplicatedMapConfig.getReplicationDelayMillis()
    since new implementation will route puts to the partition owner nodes, caching won't help replication speed because most of the time subsequent puts will end up in different nodes
    com.hazelcast.monitor.LocalReplicatedMapStats.getReplicationEventCount()
    replication is no more handled by event system.
    com.hazelcast.config.ReplicatedMapConfig.getReplicatorExecutorService()
    new implementation doesn't use executor service for replication
    com.hazelcast.spi.impl.operationexecutor.OperationExecutor.getRunningOperationCount()
    com.hazelcast.config.ServiceConfig.getServiceImpl()
    use ServiceConfig.getImplementation() instead
    com.hazelcast.spi.NodeEngine.getSharedService(String)
    since 3.7. Use NodeEngine.getService(String) instead.
    com.hazelcast.client.config.ClientConfig.getSocketInterceptorConfig()
    com.hazelcast.client.config.ClientConfig.getSocketOptions()
    com.hazelcast.config.MultiMapConfig.getSyncBackupCount()
    com.hazelcast.transaction.TransactionContext.getXaResource()
    since 3.5 please use HazelcastInstance.getXAResource()
    com.hazelcast.internal.ascii.memcache.GetCommandProcessor.handle(GetCommand)
    com.hazelcast.spi.NodeEngine.isActive()
    com.hazelcast.config.MapConfig.isOptimizeQueries()
    use MapConfig.getQueryCacheConfigs() instead

    com.hazelcast.client.config.ClientConfig.isSmartRouting()
    com.hazelcast.core.PartitionService.randomPartitionKey()

    com.hazelcast.client.config.ClientConfig.setAddresses(List<String>)
    com.hazelcast.core.IAtomicReference.setAndGet(E)
    will be removed from Hazelcast 3.4 since it doesn't really serve a purpose.
    com.hazelcast.config.ReplicatedMapConfig.setConcurrencyLevel(int)
    new implementation doesn't use mutexes

    com.hazelcast.client.config.ClientConfig.setConnectionTimeout(int)
    com.hazelcast.config.MapConfig.setEvictionPercentage(int)
    As of version 3.7, eviction mechanism changed. It uses a probabilistic algorithm based on sampling. Please see documentation for further details
    com.hazelcast.config.NearCacheConfig.setEvictionPolicy(String)
    since 3.8, please use NearCacheConfig.getEvictionConfig() and EvictionConfig.setEvictionPolicy(EvictionPolicy)
    com.hazelcast.config.LoginModuleConfig.setImplementation(Object)
    com.hazelcast.config.NearCacheConfig.setMaxSize(int)
    since 3.8, please use NearCacheConfig.setEvictionConfig(EvictionConfig) and EvictionConfig.setSize(int)
    com.hazelcast.config.CacheEvictionConfig.setMaxSizePolicy(CacheEvictionConfig.CacheMaxSizePolicy)
    Use EvictionConfig.setMaximumSizePolicy(MaxSizePolicy) instead of this
    com.hazelcast.config.MapConfig.setMinEvictionCheckMillis(long)
    As of version 3.7, eviction mechanism changed. It uses a probabilistic algorithm based on sampling. Please see documentation for further details.
    com.hazelcast.config.MapConfig.setOptimizeQueries(boolean)
    use MapConfig.setCacheDeserializedValues(CacheDeserializedValues) instead
    com.hazelcast.config.PartitioningStrategyConfig.setPartitionStrategy(PartitioningStrategy)
    com.hazelcast.client.config.ClientConfig.setRedoOperation(boolean)
    com.hazelcast.config.ReplicatedMapConfig.setReplicationDelayMillis(long)
    since new implementation will route puts to the partition owner nodes, caching won't help replication speed because most of the time subsequent puts will end up in different nodes
    com.hazelcast.config.ReplicatedMapConfig.setReplicatorExecutorService(ScheduledExecutorService)
    new implementation doesn't use executor service for replication
    com.hazelcast.config.ServiceConfig.setServiceImpl(Object)
    use ServiceConfig.setImplementation(Object) instead
    com.hazelcast.client.config.ClientConfig.setSmartRouting(boolean)
    com.hazelcast.client.config.ClientConfig.setSocketInterceptorConfig(SocketInterceptorConfig)
    com.hazelcast.client.config.ClientConfig.setSocketOptions(SocketOptions)
    com.hazelcast.config.MultiMapConfig.setSyncBackupCount(int)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.hazelcast.client.spi.ClientProxy(String, String)
    since 3.9, please use ClientProxy.ClientProxy(String, String, ClientContext)
    com.hazelcast.config.NearCacheConfig(int, int, String, int, boolean, InMemoryFormat)
    since 3.8, please use NearCacheConfig.NearCacheConfig(int, int, boolean, InMemoryFormat)
    com.hazelcast.config.NearCacheConfig(int, int, String, int, boolean, InMemoryFormat, EvictionConfig)
    since 3.8, please use NearCacheConfig.NearCacheConfig(int, int, boolean, InMemoryFormat, EvictionConfig)
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description

    since 3.8, please use NearCacheConfig.LocalUpdatePolicy.CACHE_ON_UPDATE

    since 3.6 use ONE_PHASE
